mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO player_training ( id, season_week, team_id, keeper, defender, playmaker, winger, passing, scorer, set_pieces ) VALUES ( #{player.id}, #{player.seasonWeek}, #{player.teamId}, #{player.keeper}, #{player.defender}, #{player.playmaker}, #{player.winger}, #{player.passing}, #{player.scorer}, #{player.setPieces} );
mapper.select: SELECT id, season_week, team_id, keeper, defender, playmaker, winger, passing, scorer, set_pieces FROM player_training WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY season_week;
SELECT id, season_week, team_id, keeper, defender, playmaker, winger, passing, scorer, set_pieces FROM player_training WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND id = #{playerId} ORDER BY season_week;
